source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenery shot of a stationary train made of shipping containers. The containers, branded with Red Bull and Prada logos, have been converted into a long skatepark with a series of ramps. A red graphic arrow is overlaid on the image, tracing a path along the course.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a scenery shot of a stationary train made of shipping containers. The containers, branded with Red Bull and Prada logos, have been converted into a long skatepark with a series of ramps. A red graphic arrow is overlaid on the image, tracing a path along the course.

generated_critique: The caption incorrectly classifies the video as a "scenery shot" and fails to describe the primary motion present. The main subject in motion is the red animated arrow. The description of its movement is too general, stating it "is overlaid on the image, tracing a path," which does not follow the instruction to describe actions in chronological order. The caption should be revised to focus on the arrow's movement, detailing its trajectory up and over the ramp on the stationary train.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: A red animated arrow traces a path from left to right across a stationary train that has been converted into a skatepark. The arrow moves up the first large ramp, which is built on a blue shipping container with Prada and Red Bull branding. It then arcs through the air and points down towards the next section of the ramp course.
